00030 #include "supt/mpx_supt.h"
00031 #include "mpx_util.h"
00032 #include "mpx_sh.h"

00035 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00036 
00037         sys_init( MODULE_R1 );  /* System-specific initialization.      */
00038         mpx_shell();            /* Execute the command-handler REPL.    */
00039 
00040         /* mpx_shell() should never return, so if we get here, then
00041          * we should exit with error status. */
00042         printf("FATAL ERROR: mpx_shell() returned!\n");
00043         exit(255);
00044 }
